###Riemannian geometry:
<br>

From [this reference](https://youtu.be/BHKd6-IJgVI).

It deals with intrinsic geometry on surfaces. Transitioning from extrinsic coordinates to intrinsic coordinates at each point on the manifold, results in a basis in the tangent space at each point:
